{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12117v1", "title": "The $L_p$ Minkowski problems on affine dual quermassintegrals", "summary": "In this paper, we provided $L_p$ curvature measures of affine dual
quermassintegrals for $p\in\mathbb{R}$, and solved the existence part of the
$L_p$ Minkowski problems for the non-symmetric measures when $p>1$ and
symmetric measures when $p\geq0$. When $p=0$, this is the affine dual Minkowski
problems, which is introduced and solved by Cai-Leng-Wu-Xi in [7].", "main_category": "math.MG", "categories": "math.MG", "published": "2025-04-16T14:27:47Z"}
